author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Hydra Miniatures has completed the triumvirate of Sci Fi games with a 10mm Company level game to compliment their Sci Fi Skirmish RETRO RAYGUN and classic ship-combat game WAR ROCKET. Take your Atomic Tank to face the colossi of the Robot Legion in this mass-combat rules-lite game in a retro-future inspired by Flash Gordon or other 50's and 60's media. 

Big thanks to Hydra for a complimentary copy of the book to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

title: GMG Reviews - ATOMIC TANK by Hydra Miniatures

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
ODST - Feet First into Hell is out now and brings the Orbital Drop units from HALO lore to the battlefield. Not the genetically enhanced Spartans, the ODST are the best of the best unaltered humanity has to throw at the covenant and this box comes with an entire table of terrain, two fireteams and plenty of options to take these elite USMC troops to war and throw down in familiar game modes in HALO: Flashpoint, based on the Deadzone system.

Thanks to Mantic for the complimentary copy of the box to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames
